sections.heading: tender.All cash payments of principal, interest, premiums, dividends, and other cash consideration received on any investment authorized under the Insurers Investment Act shall be payable in lawful money of the United States except as provided in section 44-5137

sections.text:
44-5118.Legal tender.

All cash payments of principal, interest, premiums, dividends, and other cash consideration received on any investment authorized under the Insurers Investment Act shall be payable in lawful money of the United States except as provided in section 44-5137.

SourceLaws 1991, LB 237, ยง 18;Laws 1997, LB 273, ยง 9.
